title: COMPUTER FREEZES DURING GAME. FAULTING MODULE NAME: RADS_USER_KERNEL.EXE, EXCEPTION CODE: 0XC0000005
body:
Hello all,

My computer freezes during game.  Have to switch off and on.  
It's been happening for the last 2 or 3 days.

Reinstalled Windows 7 and game, but still same problem.

See the link above for detail error. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/25446198

Thanks.

replies.body: This error might be caused by a zealous anti-virus software's settings or firewall.  Double check your anti-virus and also grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically config your firewall.  Test it out in a custom game to be sure.  I hope that helps!

Hello Porocles,

Thanks for your reply. 

I don't have any anti-virus running at the moment, but I will try turning off the Windows firewall tomorrow morning.

Thanks again for your reply.  I will let you know if the firewall fixes this issue or not.

Best regards.

Hello Porocles,

I tried turning off the firewall, which didn't help.  The game worked fine for a couple of days after i gave "full control" to the Riot folder in folder permissions.  However, I am having the same problem today.  The game freezes my machine around 5 minutes into the game.  
I have even tried reinstalling the game.  
FYI: I am using the old client on Windows 7.

I have attached my log files into the support ticket mentioned above. https://riotgames.zendesk.com/attachments/token/PLSLAOVn5HaXt5KfPSIPM47mv/?name=LoL+Logs.zip


I am seeing the following messages in the log file:

000023.574|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Talents/MasteryThunderlordHelper.luabin" because it's not in the manifest.
